body_html:
Finally solved this problem...

setp1: download the corresponding pytorch bz2 file form：https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud/pytorch/win-64/. [extremly fast]

step2: install the bz2 file in anaconda through: conda install [your .bz2 directory]

ok, pytorch will be installed successfully no more than 1 minites...

AND THEN:

conda install torchvision

done.
Have fun with pytorch!

setp1: download the corresponding pytorch bz2 file form：https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud/pytorch/win-64/.      [extremly fast]
step2: install the bz2 file in anaconda through: conda install [your .bz2 directory]
ok, pytorch will be  installed  successfully no more than 1 minites...
AND THEN:
conda install torchvision
done.
Have fun with pytorch!
body:
Finally solved this problem...

setp1: download the corresponding pytorch bz2 file form：**[https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud/pytorch/win-64/](https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud/pytorch/win-64/)**.      [extremly fast]

step2: install the bz2 file in anaconda through: **`conda install [your .bz2 directory]`**

ok, pytorch will be  installed  successfully no more than 1 minites...

AND THEN:

**`conda install torchvision`**

done.
Have fun with pytorch!
